eduversum.name: KWord
eduversum.description: KWord is an easy to use Open-source word editor and part of the KOffice Office-package which was specially developed to be used with KDE. A lot of standard functions are integrated into KWord, however KWord does not look 'functions bloated' like other word editors. For the time being, a unique function of KWord is its ability not only to print to PDF-Documents but also to read and edit them. Depending on the pattern, the transfer is more or less equivalent to the original.
